attributes.action: People's vote of no confidence in the Conservative Government.
attributes.additional_details:
Adter over a decade of Conservative governments being imposed on the UK bya few english constituencies in an outdated an unfair first past the post system, seeing the public record of what these governments have done to our society, it is time for change.

While the current corrupt system stands, there is no chance for prooer representation for people voting for ither parties. It is time to implement proportional representation, and have a new general election.
attributes.background: Have a general election under the proportional representation voting system.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Hold a general election in December 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597916

Change the voting system from First Past the Post to Proportional Representation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601055

We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
